title: Sark's Time to Shine
description:
Wendi Nix, Tom Luginbill, and Greg McElroy discuss what they expect from Sarkisian in his new position at Texas, the best teams in CFP history, Saban's legacy, and an early look at next year's top teams.

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The Crew talks about expectations for Steve Sarkisian at Texas
